}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2x2:2 MIMO, two RP-SMA connectors, 2x 2dBi antennas
The device is sold as the [http://www.encore-usa.com/us/support/ENUWI-2XN42 ENUWI-2XN42] (2dBi antennas included) and the [http://www.encore-usa.com/mz/taxonomy/term/469/all ENUWI-2XN45] (5dBi antennas included).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
